name: Avoiding The Buttrooms
description:
You were just trying to take a dump in peace when all of a sudden you find yourself stuck in The Buttrooms!

Is there a way out? Who is Brent? And why am I asking someone who hasn't even played the game yet so many questions? Who knows...

The only thing I know for sure is that The Buttrooms are a dangerous place indeed. Only those with a good memory, an iron will, and a high tolerance for stinkiness have a true chance at escaping them.

Good luck.
